lead_paragraph: A sinking economy and extensive corruption led to the removal of the president, but there is not a hint of political reform on the horizon.
snippet: A sinking economy and extensive corruption led to the removal of the president, but there is not a hint of political reform on the horizon....

headline.main: Rousseff’s Impeachment Changes the Government, Not the Politics
headline.print_headline: Rousseff’s impeachment changes the government, not the politics
